meanings.definition: The state or quality of being icky.
meanings.sent1: The ickinesses of the slimy frog made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't stand the ickinesses of the sticky mud on my shoes.
meanings.sent3: The ickinesses of the gooey slime reminded me of a silly prank.
meanings.sent4: The ickinesses of the situation clung to me like a bad smell.
meanings.sent5: The ickinesses of the moldy cheese were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Things that are unpleasant or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The garbage can was full of ickinesses that made me gag.
meanings.sent2: I tried to avoid the ickinesses of the dirty public restroom.
meanings.sent3: The ickinesses of the spoiled milk were a nasty surprise.
meanings.sent4: The ickinesses of the situation were like a dark cloud hanging over us.
meanings.sent5: The ickinesses of the rotten fruit filled the room with a foul smell.
